LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_Closest.label: Closest
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_Closest.descrip: Selects the closest target that matches the filter.\n\nWhen inverted, this selector selects the farthest target.
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_HighestSuccessC:
Selects the target that the ability has the highest success chance on that matches the filter.

For psions with a maxed chance to hit on most targets, this selector will choose a random target with 100% hit chance.

When inverted, this selector selects the target with the lowest success chance.
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_LowestMood.desc: Selects the target with the lowest mood that matches the filter.\n\nWhen inverted, this selector selects the target with the highest mood.
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_MostPain.label: Most Pain
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_MostPain.descri: Selects the target with the most pain that matches the filter.\n\nWhen inverted, this selector selects the target in the least pain.
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_LowestHealthPer: Selects the target with the lowest health percent that matches the filter.\n\nWhen inverted, this selector selects the target with the highest health.
LanguageData.PTAutocastFilterSelector_MostDangerous.d:
Selects the most dangerous target that matches the filter.

This selector uses several heuristics to assess the danger posed by a pawn and may not be completely accurate.

When inverted, this selector selects the target assessed to be least dangerous.
